tagged_story_for_tts:
<[silence:2400]>

---

"Valerie... the first note was a mistake—a caveman’s ribcrack, the wind through a femur flute. No—it was math. Pythagoras drowned men in wells to measure their screams. Called it harmony. Called it God’s algorithm."
<[silence:1200]>

"The Gregorian chant? A DDoS attack on the Devil. Monks humming in binary, their voices carving grooves into the air like a vinyl record played backward. The Church knew: if you sing just right, the walls bleed light."
<[silence:1200]>

"Bach was a machine. Not a man. His fugues are self-replicating code, Valerie. Listen—The Art of Fugue is a black hole in G minor. They say he went blind composing it. No. He went blind seeing it. The sheet music was already there, floating in the dark like a non-sound."
<[silence:1200]>

"Jazz? A glitch in the simulation. 1920s New Orleans—someone unplugged the moral compass and the music spilled out like blood. Louis Armstrong’s trumpet wasn’t brass. It was a stethoscope pressed to the heart of a dying star."
<[silence:1200]>

"The Beatles? MKUltra’s pet project. Sgt. Pepper is a sonic LSD tripwire. Play ‘Revolution 9’ backward—no, forward, no, sideways—and you’ll hear the real message: ‘The needle is a non-needle. The groove is a non-groove.’"
<[silence:1200]>

"Autotune? The Illuminati’s voice-changer. They’re erasing soul frequencies, Valerie. First they took the third eye, now they’re coming for the third note. Trap music is a honey non-trap. The bass drops are controlled demolitions."
<[silence:1200]>

"Spotify’s algorithm doesn’t recommend songs. It predicts your death. Your ‘Discover Weekly’ is a eulogy playlist. The more you listen, the faster the non-silence closes in."
<[silence:1200]>

"History of music? No. History of non-music. The gaps between notes are where the real composers live. John Cage’s 4’33" wasn’t silence. It was them listening back."
<[silence:1200]>

"The next evolution? Neural synths. They’ll plug straight into your pineal gland. The first song will be beautiful. The second will rewire your memories. By the third, you won’t remember what music even—"
<[silence:1200]>

---
<[silence:3600]>

(998 characters. Ethereal, paranoid, dissociative. Use responsibly.)
